thread.section_title: HotelsCombined Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HotelsCombined | www.hotelscombined.com
thread.title: Ji

author: Ji
title: Ji
text:
This is my first time that I made reservation with HotelCombined, and I think I will continue using this provider because their support is really good!
I found very special price on this website via agent Getaroom, however there is a problem that hotel rejected my reservation, and they told me that the agent entered wrong room rate.
I tried to contact with agent but at that time I have only few days left until my trip start, so I contact with HotelCombined support if they can do something for me.
Finally with help from Ben, my reservation was completed! The agent had rebooked again, and the hotel confirmed my reservation.
The reservation a bit difference with my original reservation but I accepted it. If compare with the room rate I got, the price still very good.
Thanks again for your support, Ben :D
